attributes.action: Uber to release drivers saved up money towards buying a electric car to drivers
attributes.additional_details: At such a difficult time where self employed Uber drivers don’t fit under any category and have been left unsupported and ignored the money saved up for each driver is a huge help to see ourselves through such a financial chaos
attributes.background: To make Uber to pay back the money which have been taken from uber drivers towards changing to electric car and been put aside

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Uber, not the UK Government or Parliament.

Since you started this petition, the Government has announced support measures for self employed workers. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-a-grant-through-the-coronavirus-covid-19-self-employment-income-support-scheme

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
